originalText.text: This is our daughter first year at MCA and we love it. They are 100% focus in the students educational growth. We feel the school is working with us to build our daughters values and education. We transfer our daughter from public school. Her educational progress in amazing. She was very behind when she started 1st grade. The teacher and the school provided us with resources, like tutoring and guidance on how to help my daughter to reach the level of education with the rest of class group. Before the end of the year, she was able to be current with the other students. The teacher has helped us every step of the way. The small class group help to focus more in the student and to notice when they are slacking in certain areas. We love MCA and now we are bringing our youngest to be part of the school too.

originalText.text: The Best Christian- Centered school around.  I fell in love with the commitment every teacher has for all of their students and excellent communication with parents.  They go the extra mile to make sure your child excel not only in their academics, but also in their social/ spiritual growth.  I am forever grateful to have found MCA.

text.text: The Best Christian- Centered school around.  I fell in love with the commitment every teacher has for all of their students and excellent communication with parents.  They go the extra mile to make sure your child excel not only in their academics, but also in their social/ spiritual growth.  I am forever grateful to have found MCA.

originalText.text:
Manhattan Christian Academy (MCA) was, and is, an answer to prayer regarding our son’s development and education. We prayed for our child well before his conception and birth. Part of those prayers were  for our child to obtain a strong Christian and academic education—in a safe school environment—where God is exalted. MCA has provided this and much more!

Both, the curriculum and Biblical foundation, are strong and have equipped our son academically, as well as spiritually. The administration, faculty and staff are all God-loving, dedicated, persons whom we have always felt privileged to have instruct and guide our son. We trust them fully! We have always felt at peace when our son is at this school. And he has excelled in every aspect.

The Christian values we teach him at home, have always been reinforced at MCA. Consequently, at age 13—after attending MCA since Kindergarten—our son has a solid Christian foundation. We are confident that as he graduates from 8th grade, and transitions to High School later this year—that he will thrive in his new school environment, due to his preparation at MCA.

We are deeply grateful to God for the wonderful leadership and staff at MCA. We highly recommend this school. The tuition is reasonable and most importantly children are taught with love and prepared academically and spiritually. Please enroll your child—you will not regret it! In fact, your child and you will be deeply blessed!
-Alex and Wanda M - Grateful & Proud MCA Parents, K - 8th grade)

originalText.text: This school is one of the best schools in the county! The teacher are well prepared,the classes are small so your child has a great chance to be taken care of and i love all the extra activities the have for my child! The keep you updated via email,text and calls of your kids progress and if your child does well they reward them with vouchers from local businesses like sky zone ,Pizza Hut , flippers and many more. My child is honor roll and student Of The Month and they encourage her to want to study more. Many people tell me to put her in a private school but honestly i see how much attention to detail they have here that i see no need. My child fell down and the teacher emailed me explaining what happen during recess and how they handled it and this gives me peace of mind when i drop off my child. During field trips the teachers takes beautiful candid pictures of the kids showing what a great time they are having and email them to all parents... mrs Serrano is awesome!!!

originalText.text: My 3 year attends pre school here and my daughter who is in 2nd grade has been coming here since preschool and I must admit they are awesome . The school has been great to my children and to my household . Year by year the school progresses and has one goal in mind to make our children better . Being that I live in an urban neighborhood it’s hard to find a school that you feel comfortable with not only with staff but the children as well . What’s best is that the classes are not over crowded so the children and teachers grow better relationships. Mr Cruz is an amazing art teacher and ms Mercedes is probably one of the best principles I seen or met . Lastly every single teacher my children have had have been amazing and til this day my girls talk highly about them and say they miss them . Thank you mca and keep helping our youth for the future . — Christopher Lugo
